title: Digital Retail Apps Announces SelfPay Showcase at the Visa Innovation Center at One Market in San Francisco
text:
Digital Retail Apps' shop in-store, pay in-app solution SelfPay to be showcased to guests of Visa's Everywhere Shop in San Francisco, CA.
San Francisco, CA
Digital Retail Apps, developer of the Shop In-Store, Pay In-App SelfPay technology, today announced an agreement to showcase SelfPay’s “skip-the-checkout-line” mobile self-checkout solution at the Visa Innovation Center at One Market in San Francisco. Digital Retail Apps is providing SelfPay self-checkout technology for Visa’s Everywhere Shop mobile app, giving shoppers the ability to shop and pay from anywhere in-store directly on their own mobile device and skip the checkout line.
Visa guests have the opportunity to experience the time-saving convenience and ease of retail shopping and payments with the Visa Everywhere Shop checkout app, embedded with SelfPay’s technology, built for the Samsung Galaxy S6. The solution enables guests to use smartphones loaded with Visa’s Everywhere Shop app to scan items they want to buy, build a cart, and pay for their in-store purchases directly in-app on their mobile device. Guests will be able to scan printed barcodes from physical items as well as digital barcodes displayed on an interactive digital wall, and Visa team members will have the ability to instantly verify an in-app payment using SelfPay’s patented purchase verification solution for in-store sales.
The announcement of this showcase is indicative of the ever-increasing rate of mobile commerce in use by retail shoppers. A recent Deloitte study shows that over half of all shoppers would rather look up product details and pay for an in-store purchase on their own mobile device rather than visit a self-checkout kiosk or work with a store associate. Another study by App Dynamics shows that 75% of U.S. shoppers who own a smartphone, tablet or both desire apps that let them bypass checkout lines at brick-and-mortar stores.
“Having SelfPay technology showcased at One Market is an exciting signal that in-app mobile payments are on their way to mainstream brick-and-mortal retail,” said Wendy MacKinnon Keith, CEO of Digital Retail Apps. “The traditional point of sale is shifting from a fixed location or associate-operated mobile device to a cloud solution on a shopper’s personal mobile device. We’re thrilled to showcase this leading technology to the world and know Visa’s guests will be impressed by the seamless mobile shop and pay SelfPay experience.”
One Market’s Visa Everywhere Shop will showcase Digital Retail Apps’ SelfPay experience starting today. Visa guests will be able to shop for items in-store and pay in-app using a stored Visa card. The SelfPay-powered checkout app plans to introduce additional mobile in-app payment methods such as Visa Checkout in the near future.
About Digital Retail Apps
Digital Retail Apps, a private company with offices in Toronto and San Francisco, is focused on providing retail shoppers with a completely seamless shopping and payment experience. The company's flagship mobile solution, SelfPay, improves brick and mortar retail by giving shoppers the ability to shop and pay from anywhere in-store directly on their own mobile device and skip the checkout line. SelfPay integrates directly with the retailer’s own POS and payments processing back end and includes access to a patented purchase verification method. This ensures that all items have been paid for before shoppers leave the store. SelfPay can be deployed as a customizable white label app for a single retailer or as a multi-retailer app for other service providers. SelfPay technology is available to be licensed and inserted into an existing shopping app to extend its functionality. Retailers can make shopping more convenient and gain access to more shoppers by participating in SelfPay’s multi-retailer self-checkout solution – one app that works everywhere -- making it even easier for shoppers. SelfPay builds loyalty, conversion and basket size, with less labor for increased sales, higher operating margins and extraordinary ROI for retailers. For more information, visit http://www.digitalretailapps.com and @digitalretail
Wendy MacKinnon Keith, inventor of SelfPay, is the CEO and Founder of Digital Retail Apps. She previously consulted to Fortune 100 companies with The MAC Group/Gemini Consulting and other firms.
